LanguageData.LingZeroTechBottleCap.label: Zero sub-mechanical core
LanguageData.LingZeroTechBottleCap.description: A small bottle cap, just holding this little thing makes you feel very happy. It can be used to craft a variety of objects, or to evolve chips in the body
LanguageData.LingZeroTechPowerCore.label: Zero sub energy core
LanguageData.LingZeroTechPowerCore.description: A crystal shimmering with colorful light, a little soft to the touch, but exceptionally tough, you can feel the great energy contained in it, but you don't know what this energy will bring
